title: Am I the only one who feels I don’t deserve this?
content: I recently joined PESU RR campus and I’m overwhelmed. I can’t get anything done. I feel like every living thing on campus is smarter than me and I can’t get myself to compete with them. I feel like I don’t deserve this college. What do I do?

comments.body: It gets better OP. We all definitely felt that coming into the college. It wasn't until 4th or 5th sem did it sink in that I will not be as good my peers and that's okay. At the end of the day, there will be someone better than you at something. The only competition is your past self. Hang in there!
Trust me, it gets better. Focus on yourself and your work. We're with you.
Chill man. People show off more than they know. You do your part well. Within one semester you will see it all.

Since you just joined, you probably hold the college in very high regard. You'll change your mind in a few sems dw. Also, dw about the others. Most of them are just as smart as you are. There'll obviously be some very brilliant people but most of your peers will be just as smart as you are. Just put in a bit kf hardwork and you'll score more than most of them. Stop lessening your morale and enjoy your first year
